com.atakmap.android.imagecapture.opengl

Interface GLOffscreenCaptureRequest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GLModelCaptureRequest, VehicleModelCaptureRequest, VehicleOutlineCaptureRequest

    public interface GLOffscreenCaptureRequest
    Used with GLOffscreenCaptureService to draw content to the OpenGL canvas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getHeight()
      Get the desired height of the bitmap capture
      int getWidth()
      Get the desired width of the bitmap capture
      void onDraw(GLOffscreenCaptureParams params)
      Draw content to the current canvas provided by the render service
      void onFinished(android.graphics.Bitmap bmp)
      The content is finished being drawn and converted to a bitmap
      void onStart()
      Called on the GL thread before any other calls are made

    • Method Detail

      • onStart

        void onStart()
        Called on the GL thread before any other calls are made

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Get the desired width of the bitmap capture
        Returns:
        Width in pixels

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Get the desired height of the bitmap capture
        Returns:
        Height in pixels

      • onDraw

        void onDraw(GLOffscreenCaptureParams params)
        Draw content to the current canvas provided by the render service
        Parameters:
        params - Parameters used by capture service

      • onFinished

        void onFinished(android.graphics.Bitmap bmp)
        The content is finished being drawn and converted to a bitmap
        Parameters:
        bmp - Bitmap output
